basic_info.description: ðŸ‘‹ I'm Gerasimos Copoulos, a young & eager software professional. I'm experienced with in-demand back-end languages like Python and node.js, as well as front-end frameworks like React (including Redux & React Native). Please take a look below for an overview of my recent projects and my highlighted skills. Thank you!

projects.title: Local Gems
projects.description: A mobile app made for finding cheap but highly-rated local restaurants, built in React Native and deployed to Expo (currently working on deploying to the Google App Store). Featuring a professional-grade user experience, an account authentication system, and integration with the Google Maps API and Google Cloud services.

projects.title: BoldlyGo Space Flights
projects.description: Sci-fi themed educational website allowing the user to view upcoming and previous SpaceX launches, as well as plan mock launches of their own. Back-end built in node.js, utilizing MongoDB as a NoSQL database, with a front-end built with React (using the Arwes framework for sci-fi UIs) -- deployed via AWS using a Docker container.

projects.title: React/Redux Web Apps
projects.description: A few miscellaneous web apps I built, mostly for personal use. Includes: A music recommendation sampler, a poker hand simulator, and an ESP guessing test to demonstrate principles of probability.

projects.title: TES Modding projects
projects.description: I mod RPG games in The Elder Scrolls franchise as a hobby -- my mods are unique in their frequent integration of external scripts written in python and node.js, and have received viral media attention (1m+ total views) several times for their creativity and technicality. For more information, google 'Nickies Pizzablivion' and 'Nickies Cross-Game Invader Add-on.'

projects.title: UFC Bout Predictor (ML)
projects.description: A ML jupyter notebook that uses scraped UFC fighter data to make predictions about the outcomes of UFC fights. Uses DNNs and manual feature selection.

projects.title: Java Mock MVC Banking System
projects.description: A mockup of a banking system in Java, with Checking and Savings Accounts and standard ATM features like balance checking. Meant to demonstrate Model-View-Controller design pattern and uses JUnit for testing.
